comments.author: F4ctr
comments.body: You live in Senamiestis, possibly old house which has shitty insulation (if any). And when you pay for m2 of heating, not as a flat but as a whole building, energy costs is divided by m2 for each flat. So you will pay a metric fuckton of money. Get a flat in a renovated house, or newly built one, you will pay \~100 Euros/month for everything + rent.
